meanings.sent1: The substance was nonsaponifiable, so it could not turn into soap.
meanings.sent2: The nonsaponifiable oil remained unchanged when mixed with the soap solution.
meanings.sent3: The nonsaponifiable ingredient rebelled against the soap-making process.
meanings.sent4: Her stubbornness was like a nonsaponifiable barrier, resisting any attempt to change her mind.
meanings.sent5: The concept of nonsaponifiable materials stuck in my mind like glue.

meanings.definition: Unable to undergo the process of saponification.
meanings.sent1: The nonsaponifiable fats in the mixture did not react with the lye.
meanings.sent2: The scientist discovered a new nonsaponifiable compound that puzzled the researchers.
meanings.sent3: The nonsaponifiable substance played hard to get with the soap-making process.
meanings.sent4: Her resistance to change was like a nonsaponifiable shield, protecting her beliefs.
meanings.sent5: The idea of nonsaponifiable elements in the experiment sparked curiosity among the students.
